title: Darkness Rising: The Complete Series
description:
"Friends are like condoms. They protect you when things get hard."
That’s what my five best friends said when we were younger. But that was before we found out our souls were fated and that we were destined for more.I don't know if there's a condom out there that's strong enough to protect us from what's coming our way now.In the midst of natural disasters wreaking havoc on earth, we must claw our way out of the pit of grief we find ourselves in after a tragic loss, because another realm is counting on us to save it from a great evil.A realm that we apparently used to call home and can't remember.Welcome to the disaster that is my life.Grab a seat and buckle up, because no way am I letting us die.Content warning: Darkness Rising is a series that touches on some dark themes such as noncon and child SA. This book has a 18+ warning. This set contains all three books in the series—Desolation, Detonation, and Devastation—as well as a brand-new bonus prequel and extended epilogue.*
author: R.L. Caulder
